item.title: Easter ring help (like 5 seconds please)
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

[code][code]Im making a minigame and I need my easter ring to change me into an easter egg (npc 3690)
This is the code I have below, but it isnt working…

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 7927) { // Easter Ringg npcId = 3690; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } //else { //playerSE = 0x328; //playerSEW = 0x333; //} pEmote = playerSE; drunk = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Its right below:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151) { //Whip playerSER = 1661; }

Can someone tell me why im not turning into an npc when I equip the ring? I have the easter ring with the other rings in item.java so i dunno the problem.[/code][/code]

Read full topic
